titleStmt.title: A rhetorical rapture as composed into a funeral oration at the mournfull moving of His Highnes stately effigies from Somerset-House. / By Mr. Slater.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Had not our sins or'e our prayers prevail'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
